Interface Attackable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Follower, Leader

    interface Attackable
    The interface provides necessary method structure for targets that can be attacked. In this project, it is implemented by Follower and Leader.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getHealth() 
      boolean hasDamageImmune() 
      void heal(int heal)
      Heals the object for a certain amount of health
      boolean isAlive() 
      void takeDamage(Follower attacker)
      Object takes attack damage from a follower.
      void takeDamage(int damage)
      Deal a specific amount of damage to the object

    • Method Detail

      • getHealth

        int getHealth()
        Returns:
        the object's current health

      • hasDamageImmune

        boolean hasDamageImmune()
        Returns:
        true if the target is damage immune, false otherwise

      • heal

        void heal(int heal)
        Heals the object for a certain amount of health
        Parameters:
        heal - the amount of health to be healed

      • isAlive

        boolean isAlive()
        Returns:
        true if the object is alive, false otherwise

      • takeDamage

        void takeDamage(Follower attacker)
        Object takes attack damage from a follower. The damage dealt is equal to the follower's current attack
        Parameters:
        attacker - the attacker follower

      • takeDamage

        void takeDamage(int damage)
        Deal a specific amount of damage to the object
        Parameters:
        damage - The amount of damage to be dealt
